00071 //===========================================================================
00072 
00073 #include "ZNconfig.h"
00074 #include "ZNminmax.h"
00075 
00076 #include <cmath>
00077 #include "LinAlg/arrayoptimize.h"
00078 
00079 /*
00080 #ifdef _WIN32
00081 #ifndef __MIN_MAX__
00082 #define __MIN_MAX__
00083 namespace std {
00084 //
00085 // undefine macros min and max to avoid conflicts with template names
00086 //
00087 #ifdef min
00088 #undef min
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #ifdef max
00092 #undef max
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 //
00096 // template functions 'min' and 'max' are not defined for _WIN32
00097 // due to name conflicts
00098 //
00099 template < class T > inline T min( T a, T b ) { return a < b ? a : b; }
00100 template < class T > inline T max( T a, T b ) { return a > b ? a : b; }
00101 }
00102 #endif
00103 #endif
00104 */
00105 
00106 //===========================================================================
00192 void lnsrch
00193 (
00194     Array< double >& xold,
00195     double fold,
00196     Array< double >& g,
00197     Array< double >& p,
00198     Array< double >& x,
00199     double& f,
00200     double stpmax,
00201     bool& check,
00202     double (*func)( const Array< double >& )
00203 )
00204 {
00205     SIZE_CHECK( xold.ndim( ) == 1 &&
00206                 xold.samedim( g ) &&
00207                 xold.samedim( p ) &&
00208                 xold.samedim( x ) )
00209 
00210     const double ALF  = 1.0e-4;
00211     const double TOLX = 1.0e-7;
00212 
00213     unsigned n, i;
00214     double a,alam,alam2(0.),alamin,b,disc,f2(0.),rhs1,rhs2,slope,sum,temp,
00215       test,tmplam;
00216 
00217     n     = xold.nelem( );
00218     check = false;
00219 
00220     for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00221         sum += p( i ) * p( i );
00222     sum = sqrt( sum );
00223 
00224     if( sum > stpmax )
00225         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00226             p( i ) *= stpmax / sum;
00227 
00228     /*
00229      * dot product of search direction and gradient
00230      */
00231     for( slope = 0., i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00232         slope += g( i ) * p( i );
00233 
00234     test = 0.;
00235     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
00236         temp = fabs( p( i ) ) / std::max( fabs( xold( i ) ), 1. );
00237         if( temp > test )
00238             test = temp;
00239     }
00240 
00241     alamin = TOLX / test;
00242     alam   = 1.;
00243     for( ; ; ) {
00244         for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00245             x( i ) = xold( i ) + alam * p( i );
00246         f = func( x );
00247 
00248         if( alam < alamin ) {
00249             for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00250                 x( i ) = xold( i );
00251             check = true;
00252             return;
00253         } else if( f <= fold + ALF * alam * slope )
00254             return;
00255         else {
00256             if( alam == 1. )
00257                 tmplam = -slope / ( 2. * ( f - fold - slope ) );
00258             else {
00259                 rhs1 = ( f - fold - alam * slope ) / ( alam * alam );
00260                 rhs2 = ( f2 - fold - alam2 * slope ) / ( alam2 * alam2 );
00261                 a = 3. * ( rhs1 - rhs2 ) / ( alam - alam2 );
00262                 b = ( -alam2 * rhs1 + alam * rhs2 ) / ( alam - alam2 );
00263                 if( a == 0. )
00264                     tmplam = -slope / ( 2. * b );
00265                 else {
00266                     disc = b * b - a * slope;
00267                     if( disc < 0. ) {
00268                         std::cerr << "Roundoff problem in lnsrch." << std::endl;
00269                         //ASSERT( false );
00270                     } else
00271                         tmplam = ( -b + sqrt( disc ) ) / a;
00272                 }
00273                 if( tmplam > 0.5 * alam )
00274                     tmplam = 0.5 * alam;
00275             }
00276         }
00277 
00278         alam2 = alam;
00279         f2    = f;
00280         alam  = std::max( tmplam, 0.1 * alam );
00281     }
00282 }
